import React from 'react'; import { Alert } from 'reactify'; import { simpleCode, disabledCode, customThemeCode, borderPositionCode, customColorCode, childrenCode, customClassCode, } from './code-refrence'; import './alert.scss'; import DemoCard from '../../components/demo-card'; const AlertDemo = () => (
A simple alert This is disabled This is a left alert!
This is a right alert!
This is a top alert!
This is a bottom alert!
This is all direction alert!
This is a two direction alert!
Card title

Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.

Go somewhere
Alert with custom border color This Alert has custom class Primary theme
Secondary theme
Dark theme
Light theme
Info theme
Warning theme
Danger theme
Success theme
); export default AlertDemo;
